common.title: AI Translator
common.subtitle: AI Translator
common.description: Experience the power of AI-driven translation with stunning visual design
common.experience_power: Experience the power of AI-driven translation with stunning visual design
common.supporting_languages: Supporting multiple languages with OpenAI-compatible APIs

translation.no_result: No translation result yet. Enter some text and click translate to get started.

settings.title: API Settings
settings.description: Configure your OpenAI-compatible API settings for translation.
settings.invalid_url_desc: Please enter a valid URL for the Base URL field.
settings.base_url_note: Leave empty to use OpenAI default. For custom endpoints, include the full URL.
settings.security_note: Your API key is stored locally and never sent to our servers
settings.models_note: Models are fetched from your API endpoint. Click refresh to update the list.
settings.fallback_models_desc: Could not fetch models from API. Using common models instead.

dynamic_loading_notes.0: Models are automatically fetched from your API endpoint
dynamic_loading_notes.2: If fetching fails, fallback models will be shown
dynamic_loading_notes.3: Different endpoints may have different available models

api_test.title: API Connection Test
api_test.test_successful_desc: Your API configuration is working correctly.
api_test.connection_error_desc: Failed to connect to the API endpoint.

toast.please_configure_api: Please configure your API key in settings
